    ScoreGeneratorProportion.java --- A ScoreGenerator based on returning a score based on a generated numerator and denominator (=> Proportion!).

    • Method Detail

      • canGenerateScore

        protected abstract boolean canGenerateScore()
        Function defining if a score can be generated. If not the default score is returned instead.
        Returns:
        true if a score can be generated, false if not.

      • defineNumerator

        protected abstract int defineNumerator()
        Returns:
        the numerator that will be used in the score generation.

      • defineDenominator

        protected abstract int defineDenominator()
        Returns:
        the denominator that will be used in the score generation.

      • generateScore

        public double generateScore(GameState gameState,
                            int framesPassed)
        Description copied from interface: ScoreGenerator
        Function for generating a score based on a given GameState.
        Parameters:
        gameState - the GameState whose score will be generated.
        framesPassed - the frames that have passed since the last time the score was generated.
        Returns:
        a score for the given GameState utilizing the frames that passed since the last iteration.
